title: I'm so frustrated with everything right now
body: I've been waiting all fucking day for riots dogshit patcher to update when not 10 minutes ago my fucking internet crashed and now I have to do the whole shit show again. I want to curl up into a fucking ball and cry.

replies.body: have you ever thought the problem was you and not the patcher? i mean it only took me 5 or 10 minutes to update on my mediocre laptop
Before it kept on telling me that there was an error and that I needed to retry so I needed to delete a file or something

>
> Before it kept on telling me that there was an error and that I needed to retry so I needed to delete a file or something

have you tried deleting and redownloading it if your patcher is always given you trouble? if that doesn't fix then problem then its definitely you

you could be like me and have 2 herniated discs in your lower back which prevent you from doing anything that currently brings you joy such as running, basketball, working out, or even things that involve sitting down like doing artwork or playing League.

quitcherbitchen

This game isn't worth crying over. While I don't hold frustration against you, if it were me, I'd save it for a game that deserved it. League, alas, is not the game it once was (their crap patcher is one of many examples of this).
